properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 16 at 11:20AM AKST until February 18 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring. Travel will be very
difficult to impossible. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to
4 inches, with localized amounts up to 6 inches, are expected.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM Tuesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 70 mph will cause
whiteout conditions in blowing snow. Significant drifting of
the snow is likely.
properties.instruction:
A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are
expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds
and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout
conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

NWSheadline: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY
